game.title: The Lost Treasure of El Dorado
game.objective: Find the lost treasure of El Dorado hidden within a mysterious temple.
game.description: You have been hired by a wealthy explorer to find the lost treasure of El Dorado. The treasure is said to be hidden within a mysterious temple deep in the Amazon rainforest. You must travel to the rainforest, find the temple, and retrieve the treasure before your rivals do.
game.reward: The treasure of El Dorado, worth millions of dollars.

task.description: You must travel to the Amazon rainforest to begin your search for the treasure. You can do this by taking a boat from Manaus, Brazil, or by flying into Puerto Maldonado, Peru.
Once you arrive in the Amazon rainforest, you must find the lost temple. The temple is said to be located deep within the rainforest, and it is guarded by dangerous creatures and traps.
Once you find the temple, you must retrieve the treasure. The treasure is said to be hidden in a secret chamber within the temple. You must find the chamber and open it to claim the treasure.
